description: Try our easy to follow Prawn & Rocket Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawn & Rocket Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 60 g baby spinach & rocket salad mix
280 g prawns with lemon and garlic butter

recipeInstructions.text: Add sour cream, reserved water, pasta and three-quarters of the salad mix. Toss to coat. Transfer to dishes. Scatter over cheese. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden. Serve topped with remaining salad mix.

Add sour cream, reserved water, pasta and three-quarters of the salad mix. Toss to coat. Transfer to dishes. Scatter over cheese. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden. Serve topped with remaining salad mix.
